df = pd.read_csv("./assets/datasets/sales_tiny.csv")

lessons.title: Filter data
lessons.starter:
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv("./assets/datasets/sales_tiny.csv")
df["revenue"] = df["units"] * df["price"]

print(sub)

lessons.title: Group & aggregate
lessons.starter:
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv("./assets/datasets/sales_tiny.csv")
df["revenue"] = df["units"] * df["price"]
rep = df.groupby("region")["revenue"].sum().sort_values(ascending=False)
print(rep)
